title.cmt: h2で引っかかる、基本innertextで書き換える

MoreSetting.text: Hide the number: following and follower

Description.text:
Hides all notes by the specified user.
Please enter userID.
(separated by , if there are multiple users)
Example: ikakonbu, syuilo, abc123

Hides renotes by the specified user.
Please enter userID.
(separated by , if there are multiple users)
Example: ikakonbu, syuilo, abc123

Change the display format of the emoji picker.
Makes it easier to select horizontal emojis.

Make the button to hide the image larger.
This makes it easier to press.

It will work on servers that do not exist in the [server list]
at the bottom of this page.

Please enter the domain name of your server
(If multiple servers, please separate them with `,` )
However, it may not work on other servers than Misskey.io

Output the current settings as CSS code.
If you are using misskey from a browser on another device,
you can paste the output code into
'Settings → General → Custom CSS'
to use the same filtering settings.

(This will not work with third-party client apps.)

other.lasttext: I am the sole developer of this extension. Sorry if it doesn't work.😇
other.warning:
Please read

This extension not work.
If you are using firefox, you can change your settings to use it.

  • Type about:config in address bar
  • A warning message appears, ignore and continue.
  • Find setting: layout.css.has-selector.enabled
    • (Type in the textbox on the screen, it will come right up)
  • Double-click on the that and set the value to true
  • Restart Firefox
other.cmt: warningだけinnerHTMLで置き換えること
